title: woman judge: medium skin tone

nouns: A woman is a female human.

Judges are officials who presides over a court of law, either alone or as part of a panel, and make determinations about the applicability of the law to the facts presented.
A judge presides over court proceedings, either alone or as a part of a panel of judges.

A public official authorized to decide questions brought before a court of justice
A person who decides the fate of someone or something that has been called into question.

description: The Female Judge, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the  Woman,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4, ? Scales and ? Variation Selector-16 emo
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman judge with medium skin tone is depicted with an air of impartiality and wisdom, her expression serene and discerning. Her judicial robes and the scales of justice (sometimes implied by her posture) are rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges, conveying authority and fairness. This emoji symbolizes justice, truth, and making important decisions, often used in discussions about law or fairness.
